title: Original Google Pixel shows up in Hulu’s Theranos drama, ‘The Dropout,’ a year too early
content:
It’s not super uncommon for Google’s Pixel phones to show up in TV shows and movies, with one recent example being Marvel’s Hawkeye. Now, the original Google Pixel has shown up in Hulu’s series “The Dropout,” but out of its own timeline.

more…

The post Original Google Pixel shows up in Hulu’s Theranos drama, ‘The Dropout,’ a year too early appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In Hulu's new series "The Dropout," the original Google Pixel makes a cameo, but a year before the phone's actual debut.
